responses.title: The days of fair weather are over.
War is an equation, death the solution.
The war storm is upon us.
First blood, I thought I saw that in the forecast.
I grow in power and craft.
You'll be looking up at the grass.
Where you're going, the weather doesn't change.
I will speak ill of the dead.
An ounce of invention, a pound of cure.
It had to be done, cousin.
Axe, did your mother drop you on your head?
Axe, you always were a bit slow. Now a bit dead.
Warlock, the Oglodi will sign your name in the book of ancestors.
Warlock, of all the Oglodi, you were the most learned, and the most misguided.
Warlock, what is in that book of yours?
Warlock, I'll add your book to my collection.
My Strider is beyond your influence, Chen.
You were already dead from the neck up, now from the neck down.
Hmm, the Keen Folk are clever, but they die like the rest.
Your stormcraft was strong, your defenses weak.
Your skill with lightning was impressive, I admit.
Rattletrap, you Keens are a pleasure to kill.
I admire your craftsmanship; your durability I question.
Gyro, you were crazy even for the Keenfolk.
Gyro, your craft dies with you.
You'll catch your death out there.
A small-Keen and his ogre meet their deaths.
Zeus, you bring the lightning, I'll bring the thunder.
How's the weather up there, Gyro?
Gyro, for a Keen, you're not that bad.
Gonna enjoy working with you, Storm Spirit.
Bury me beneath the endless grasses.
I return to the grasslands of my home.
I reap the storm I've sown.
The storm charges my coil again.
By stormcraft, I shall lay my enemies low.
A gift from the tempest of battle.

name: Attempting to Use an Ability on Cooldown
Attempting to Use an Ability without Mana

responses.title: According to the forecast, this one is in the bag!
That was not in the forecast.
A gift from the tempest of battle.
I'll craft new storms with this.
